{{cpp/title|iswdigit}}
{{cpp/string/wide/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=cwctype|
int iswdigit( wint_t ch );
}}

Checks if the given wide character corresponds (if narrowed) to one of the ten decimal digit characters {{c/core|0123456789}}.

{{cpp/string/wide/wint_t args}}
===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|ch|wide character}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
Non-zero value if the wide character is a numeric character, zero otherwise.

===Notes===
{{tt|std::iswdigit}} and {{lc|std::iswxdigit}} are the only standard wide character classification functions that are not affected by the currently installed C locale.

===Example===
{{example|Some locales offer additional character classes that detect non-ASCII digits
|code=
#include &lt;clocale&gt;
#include &lt;cwctype&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;

void test(wchar_t a3, wchar_t u3, wchar_t j3)
{
    std::wcout &lt;&lt; std::boolalpha
               &lt;&lt; "\t   '" &lt;&lt; a3 &lt;&lt; "'   '" &lt;&lt; u3 &lt;&lt; "'  '" &lt;&lt; j3  &lt;&lt; "'\n"
               &lt;&lt; "iswdigit: "
               &lt;&lt; (bool)std::iswdigit(a3) &lt;&lt; "  "
               &lt;&lt; (bool)std::iswdigit(u3) &lt;&lt; " "
               &lt;&lt; (bool)std::iswdigit(j3) &lt;&lt; '\n'
               &lt;&lt; "jdigit:   "
               &lt;&lt; (bool)std::iswctype(a3, std::wctype("jdigit")) &lt;&lt; ' '
               &lt;&lt; (bool)std::iswctype(u3, std::wctype("jdigit")) &lt;&lt; ' '
               &lt;&lt; (bool)std::iswctype(j3, std::wctype("jdigit")) &lt;&lt; '\n';
}

int main()
{
    wchar_t a3 = L'3';  // the ASCII digit 3
    wchar_t u3 = L'三'; // the CJK numeral 3
    wchar_t j3 = L'３'; // the full-width digit 3

    std::setlocale(LC_ALL, "en_US.utf8");
    std::wcout &lt;&lt; "In American locale:\n";
    test(a3, u3, j3);

    std::wcout &lt;&lt; "\nIn Japanese locale:\n";
    std::setlocale(LC_ALL, "ja_JP.utf8");
    test(a3, u3, j3);
}
|p=true
|output=
In American locale:
           '3'   '三'  '３'
iswdigit: true  false false
jdigit:   false false false

In Japanese locale:
           '3'   '三'  '３'
iswdigit: true  false false
jdigit:   false false true
}}
